meanings.definition: Baclofens: a muscle relaxant used to treat muscle spasms
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed baclofens to help with my muscle spasms.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a bottle of baclofens in her medicine cabinet for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: After taking baclofens, I felt as loose as a noodle!
meanings.sent4: The baclofens worked like magic, melting away the tension in my muscles.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the baclofens gently calming my muscles, like a soothing breeze.

meanings.definition: Baclofens: the plural form of baclofen, a medication used to treat muscle spasticity
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of baclofens, so I had to wait for the next shipment.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes use baclofens to help with muscle spasticity after intense workouts.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the baclofens all over the counter, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The baclofens acted like a team of tiny firefighters, putting out the muscle spasticity flames.
meanings.sent5: The effects of the baclofens were like a gentle wave, easing the tightness in my muscles.
